channel.title: Hamachi
channel.description:
Couldn't really find a section for this.
Just wondering, why the fuck are people running Hamachi? Hamachi is a VPN, it has _nothing_ to do with private servers. I can only assume that people are using it because they're too shit stupid to forward a port, even though if you have filesharing enabled, you are potentially letting other people access your shit... for no reason.
If I am wrong and there is something magic Hamachi does for the private server community, correct me.. if not, stop using it..

item.title: Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @tekken_lord tekken_lord
item.description:
@tekken_lord wrote:

you know mopman i agree too many stupid servers using hamachi lol
